description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. One day, a demon, offers to Adam the chance to conquer the girl of his dreams simply playing a head-to-head Poker with her... Will be able to obtain the heart of the girl ? A beautiful and lovely manga-style game for all Poker fans.
